scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=client & npm run dev --workspace=server
scripts.install-all: npm install --workspace=client && cd server && npm install && npm run generate-prisma && npm run push-prisma
scripts.install-production: npm ci --workspace=client && cd server && npm run install-production && npm run generate-prisma
scripts.build-production: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
